segments.text: I am absolutely appalled by what I'm seeing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer lack of awareness and responsibility is just staggering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, drying a plate like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, water is pouring out of the sink, creating a huge mess and a serious hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, they're just as bad, sneaking cookies and not paying attention to the danger around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool like he hasn't got a care in the world, but it's clearly about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how oblivious they all are, how they can't see the risks they're taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like they're all in their own little worlds, completely unaware of what's happening around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they all realize the danger before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just making me more and more frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I need to take a deep breath and remind myself that it's just a drawing, that no one is actually in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
